versos: (fearful) Psalm 139:14 - "I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.";;;

(setteth) 1 Kings 5:3 - "Thou knowest how that David my father could not build an house unto the name of the Lord his God for the wars which were about him on every side, until the Lord put them under the soles of his feet.";;;
(hands) Psalm 98:8 - Let the rivers clap their hands; let the mountains sing together for joy.;;
(hearken) Deuteronomy 6:4 - "Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God is one Lord.";;;
(amen) Revelation 7:12 - "Saying: amen Blessing and glory and wisdom, thanksgiving and honor and power and might, be to our God forever and ever. amen.";;;
(void) Genesis 1:2 - "The earth was formless and void, and darkness was over the surface of the deep, and the Spirit of God was moving over the surface of the waters.";;;
(waters) "And God said, 'Let the waters under the heavens be gathered together into one place, and let the dry land appear.' And it was so." - Genesis 1:9;;;

(divide) Hebrews 4:12 - "For the word of God is living and active, sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing to the division of soul and of spirit, of joints and of marrow, and discerning the thoughts and intentions of the heart.";;;

(appear) 1 John 3:2 - "Dear friends, now we are children of God, and what we will be has not yet been made known. But we know that when Christ appears, we shall be like him, for we shall see him as he is.";;;
(seas) Psalm 33:7 - "He gathers the waters of the sea into jars; he puts the deep into storehouses.";;;
(grass) 1 Peter 1:24 - "For, 'All people are like grass, and all their glory is like the flowers of the field; the grass withers and the flowers fall,'";;;

(seed) Genesis 22:17 - "I will surely bless you and make your descendants as numerous as the stars in the sky and as the sand on the seashore. Your descendants will take possession of the cities of their enemies,";;;
(lights) Genesis 1:14 - "And God said, 'Let there be lights in the expanse of the sky to separate the day from the night, and let them serve as signs to mark sacred times, and days and years.'";;;
(signs) Luke 21:25 - "There will be signs in the sun, moon and stars.";;;
(seasons) Genesis 8:22 - "While the earth remains, seedtime and harvest, cold and heat, summer and winter, day and night, shall not cease.";;;
(casteth) 1 Peter 5:7 - Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.;;
(creature) Romans 8:19 - "For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God.";;;
